کتاب

  • Operating System Concepts, by Silberschatz, Galvin and Gagne, 9/E(2012)

  • Operating Systems: Internals and Design, 8/E(2011), by William Stallings

  • Modern Operating Systems, 4/E(2014), by Andrew S. Tanenbaum and Herbert Bos

  • Schaum's outline of operating systems(2002), by J Archer Harris

  • Operating Systems: Three Easy Pieces(2018), by Remzi H. Arpaci-Dusseau and Andrea C. Arpaci-Dusseau

دیگر منابع

  • some resources for getting started in operating system development

  • Operating System Design

  • Operating System Concepts

  • https://www.tutorialspoint.com/operating_system
